  • {" "} About OGAPOS

We Are The Best Payment Service in Nigeria

{" "}

OGAPOS is your reliable partner for all payment solutions.

We are Safe

{" "}
Your security is our top priority. With OGAPOS, you can be assured that all your transactions are protected, giving you peace of mind every step of the way.

We are Fast

{" "}
Time is money, and we value yours. OGAPOS ensures that all your transactions are processed swiftly and efficiently, so you can get cash, send money, pay bills, and purchase airtime and data in a matter of seconds.

We are reliable

{" "}
Trust is earned, and we are committed to earning yours. OGAPOS stands out for its consistent and dependable services, ensuring that you can rely on us for all your financial needs, every time.
More Details

We are the best payment service in Nigeria

{" "}

OGAPOS is your safest, fastest and most reliable way to get cash, send cash, paybills, buy Airtime and data, Get cash when you need it and where you need it, and with our Ajo(Thrift), you become financially free. Let's grow your business without stress and make your dream a reality

Our Services

  • {" "} FAQ

General Question

{" "}
Is There a Minimum or Maximum Amount for Transactions?
There may be minimum and maximum limits for different types of transactions. Please contact customer support for specific details.
What Should I Do If I Encounter an Issue With My Transaction?
If you encounter any issues with your transaction, please contact our customer support immediately. We are available 24/7 to assist you and resolve any problems.
What Kinds of Payment Do You Accept?
We accept various forms of payment including cash, bank transfers, and major credit/debit cards for our POS transactions, bill payments, and other services.
How Can I Join the Ajo (Thrift) Program?
To join our Ajo (Thrift) program, you can contact our customer service for assistance. Our representatives will guide you through the process. 07078771831
